name: Poisoned Perp Pursing Potion
description:
Poisoned Perp Pursing Potion
Description -
A short, first-person game where you play as a witch who has accidentally poisoned themselves. Rush around your dungeon to find the antidote ingredients to brew a potion to cure yourself before you succumb to the poison.
Controls -
WASD - Movement
Ctrl - Run
E - Grab objects and ingredients

Made For - Mini Jam 129: Poison
